articles.title: Nike earnings and sales beat estimates as retailer books record revenue in North America - CNBC
articles.description: Nike on Thursday reported fiscal fourth-quarter earnings and sales that topped analysts' estimates, fueled by record revenue in North America.
articles.content:
Nike on Thursday reported fiscal fourth-quarter earnings and sales that topped analysts' estimates, fueled by record revenue in its largest market, North America.
